Upgrade.Title: Galaxy Wing Squadron
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target all friendly Galaxy-class ships within Range 1-2. Target ships gain +1 attack die this round.

Upgrade.Title: Computer Core
Upgrade.Ability: You can fill a [CREW] or [WEAPON] Upgrade slot with this Upgrade. Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: You may re-roll any 1 die this round.

Upgrade.Title: Computer Core
Upgrade.Ability: You can fill a [CREW] or [WEAPON] Upgrade slot with this Upgrade. Add 1 [TECH] Upgrade to your Upgrade Bar. ACTION: You may re-roll any 1 die this round.

Upgrade.Title: Maximum Warp
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a [STRAIGHT] Maneuver this round, you may disable this card to immediately perform an additional [STRAIGHT] Maneuver with a speed of 2 or less. You cannot perform any free Actions this round.

Upgrade.Title: High-Capacity Deflector Shield Grid
Upgrade.Ability: If you have at least 1 Active Shield, during the Compare Results step, you may discard this card to negate up to 2 damage. No ship may be equipped with more than 1 "High-Capacity Deflector Shield Grid" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Nanclus
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target an opposing ship at Range 1-3. The target ship gains +1 attack die this round, but cannot roll defense dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Control Central
Upgrade.Ability: After performing your Action, you may disable this card to perform one of the Actions on your Action Bar as a free Action. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Control Central" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Military Secrets
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may discard this card to force the defending shp to roll 1 less defense die (-2 defense dice if that ship is Cloaked).

Upgrade.Title: Additional Phaser Array
Upgrade.Ability: After you make an attack with your Primary Weapon, you may disable this card to make an additional attack with your Primary Weapon at -2 attack dice. No ship may be equipped with more than 1 "Additional Phaser Arrays" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Main Batteries
Upgrade.Ability: Add 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade icon to your Upgrade Bar. ATTACK: Place 2 Time Tokens on this card to perform this attack. Treat this attack as if it were an attack made with a Primary Weapon. No ship may be equipped with more than one "Main Batteries" Upgrade.
